website_summaries.verdict: A substantial, adjustable bookcase with a touch of casual vintage accenting.
pros: Cream colored, lightly distressed cube organizer
Top shelf supports 50 pounds, inner shelf supports 25 pounds
Looks harder to assemble than it really is
cons: Some find it a little wobbly

customer_reviews.title: Decent, But Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This will get the job done at an affordable price. It’s particle board and not real wood. The box came intact, and none of the pieces were damaged. All the right hardware was included. It’s wobbly, though. We plan to make it more sturdy by adding some L brackets. Installation took us 1 hour (hubby and me).
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Took me 2.5 hours to put together but it was worth my time. I have a Family tree mural on the wall behind it, but won’t show the pics. I also have some urns on top that you can see. I’ll attach a pic. This piece fits the new theme in my Living Room
customer_reviews.author: Annette Matos

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits a 55” tcl smart tv. Very sturdy and not so hard to put together, took me about an Hour. All the pieces were there. The two top side cubes are adjustable. Only bad thing was a small scratch on one of the sides
customer_reviews.author: Cathy_92

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase and the quality is wonderful! I purchased the unit in Vintage Black and also purchased the Baist fabric storage cubes storage baskets bins in gray linen . The combination is just perfect. I would most definitely recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! I was having a hard time finding an organizer for my baby nursery that matched our current furnishings in there which are an antique white (off-white almost). This matched to a T!!!! Perfect. Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Ricciardi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy piece of furniture .Didnt take too long to assemble and took only one person to do.Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: angela j fotheringham

customer_reviews.title: We would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE*** After contacting customer service regarding the missing pieces they contacted me in a timely fashion. They will be sending the missing pieces. EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We like it a lot. It was very easy to put together (took about 30 minutes). It’s fairly sturdy; however, it would be nice to have back piece on it to sturdy it up even more. Be careful not to lose any parts because it comes with 0 extra pieces. We were actually 4 short on the pieces that cover up the screws. Not a huge ordeal and it does not affect the effectiveness of the unit. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - not quite white, not quite gray
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has the Salinas desk with hutch that we bought her last year (I don’t believe it’s sold anymore) and she wanted a mid-sized shelf unit that matched. The unit is an off-white with a yellowish tint and has gray streaks throughout. It was proving difficult to find anything that even came close. So, imagine our delight when we found this... and it matches perfectly! Good quality and easy to assemble. Looks very cute in her room and is teenager-approved.
customer_reviews.author: Dmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Nursery
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece! My baby furniture is weather white and matches perfectly. So easy to build, I’m 20 weeks pregnant and had no problems putting it together on my own in about an hour. Can’t wait to add baskets and books! :)
customer_reviews.author: ANGIGS

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but quality control lacking!
customer_reviews.text: This shelving unit is a really nice addition to our playroom. It looks expensive and it is sturdy. With that being said, we were sent two of the same parts which meant we were unable to assemble. My husband called the company and they seemed to be expecting us to call stating we needed the correct part. It took 10 days for the correct part to ship in the mail. Other than that, we are happy with this piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Not awful, but wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: A lot more wobbly than I expected, especially compared to the matching bookcase which is actually pretty nice. There is a chipped corner in the finish. My biggest complaint though is that this is a "six cube organizer", right? I can't fit my cube baskets in it. No matter how I position the shelves, I can only get two cubes in it at maximum. This is very disappointing. The matching bookshelf is great, the "six cube organizer" is not.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Timmer

customer_reviews.title: Don't go by what you read
customer_reviews.text: Some of the other reviews mention scratches, but that is the style of the finish. Don't have high expectations and you won't be disappointed. The material is not the best but it's good value for the money. The same one is on wayf... for 50% more. Install took me 1.5 hours going slow but it does take a little work.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kaldas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty typical particle board shelving unit. Design is good. All pieces machined well. One small defect- I find most of these types of shelves will always have a ding or two resulting from transport. Overall decent.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Lower the price an it would be worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Why do I keep buying furniture off Amazon knowing damn well I’m going to hate it. Walmart has better quality furniture. How do I know this. I’ve bought from target, Walmart, Amazon an then moved like 10 times over several years an so far the Walmart brand seems to hold up best an is cheaper. This is nice but wobbles. Thin material.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging, instructions and clean final product.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was incredible-all pieces were immaculate, AND labeled. Labelling not even necessary, the instructions were very clear, I'd just add to be sure the cam holes are clear of any wood shavings so the cams seat properly. Looks great, is solid and stable and is even 2-sided (both sides finished) so could be used as a room divider for separate areas. Like most, I'd prefer solid board wood furniture with quality joints to 'engineered wood' laminated and joined with cams, but you can't touch it for this price even if you make it unless you have connections for wood and finishing products. I'd buy from Bush again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Shelves. They need to include a Back. I put it together,(which was real simple) however it was to unstable. I went to Home Depot and bought a piece of Plywood and painted it black and nail it on the back and it was much better.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: It was my first piece of furniture I've assembled! It seems good quality. Some of the diagrams could be more clear (paint side verses chipboard). Looks nice, a bit smaller than I imagined but worked out great
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Becker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to display in my livingroom and replace a much more expensive secretary. I really love this. We had it together in about an hour. I am happy with it. I wish it weren't particle board. But it does look nice!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa f

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble this solo without too much problem. It will disassemble easily too. Problem is, if you don't use some kind of glue to hold it together, it is just not sturdy at all. It does have surprisingly low weight limits, so you can't overload it. But on the plus side, it is sleek and attractive looking. Of course, it's just a veneer over pressboard but if you don't look to closely it looks pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: hot flash

customer_reviews.title: Each piece scratched and discolored ,completely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in December before we moved into our new home and just unboxed it to put together. Each piece is covered in scratches and black marks. Completely disappointed in this product as there is no way I can use it in my sons nursery. I’ve tried cleaning it and nothing is taking the markings away. Would like a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lovely furniture, wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice piece of furniture and great for the price, but even after both my husband and I went back over it twice to tighten everything up, it's pretty wobbly. That was a disappointment as I wanted to use this as a dresser / changing table and it is not sturdy enough to change a baby on. Other than that, though, it makes very nice looking storage in the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Like this a lot, but it wasn't quite what i thought it was going to be. Looks really nice in hallway and have put fabric cubby bins in shelves to keep hats and stuff out of sight, but a teensy bit more chintzy than i thought based on pictures. and seems wobbly, so might need another going over to check tightness of screws. But overall like it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to things so I had been looking for the right piece to.fit where I had moved my desk from. It took me about 3 months when I came across this! The price is great. The piece is beautiful. A little work to put together but the end result is just what I needed. Simple, beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Idalia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet looks great and is perfect for our computer area. The storage is a good size for our items and everything is accessible. Packaging was very good and everything was in perfect condition. The pieces were all there and labeled. The instructions were very easy to follow for assembly. We are very satisfied with this item.
customer_reviews.author: gregory radovich

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy,  nice quality, nice looking. For the price.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a shelf, for my art supplies, and books I like to have or currently using, in my living room. Nice looking, the two outside shelves I'm pleased with the quality for the price, perfect size. Easy to put together, philips screwdriver & pegs. About an hour to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little unit, easy to assemble and pretty solid overall. If anyone else is looking for something to match French provincial bedroom furniture, the antique white color is surprisingly close--just no gold pin-striping.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Luebker

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying more of their products!
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this is a high quality piece of furniture for the price. I was able to put it together by myself in less than an hour. In fact, I would honestly say that the box was harder to open than building the unit! As you can see in my pictures the instructions are very well marked as well as the individual pieces. I plan on buying more Bush products!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new house and a lot of this companies pieces. This piece was a little more difficult to put together by myself, once I got if together it works really well and the 6 cubes fits the space perfectly. Holding my heavy books well without sagging.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and I feel good about giving it to my daughter for my granddaughters toys in the living room. We bought some inexpensive totes to go in it for now. It is heavy enough that we don't think she can pull it over, but will secure it to the wall anyway. When baby toys are gone, my daughter has a beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: VickiA

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it once and was sent the wrong color, it was not easy to send back either because I had to tape up the box and it’s extremely heavy, load it up and drop it off at the post office...but the replacement came and color is nice it’s just shorter than I would have liked but not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend, very pleased. Great value, perfect condition, lovely color (more antique cream than white), easy assembly. Organizing Toys in baskets, using in kids play room.
customer_reviews.author: E2the

customer_reviews.title: Piece came broken 😢
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, I ended up keeping it and left the piece off that was broken because it was cosmetic. It was pretty easy to assemble as well. I’m giving 3 stars only because had it been a piece that was functional that came broken, this item would have been an absolute NIGHTMARE to return. Other than that, I would have given 4-5 stars. Quality is fine, same as Ikea furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kokayjam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Construction
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! That's about the best I can say. I know furniture by Bush and others is not designed to last. Designed to be inexpensive and look good for a little while - then to be land-filler. We've bought our fair share, but this one is a disappointment. The construction process was fine, but the end product seemed pretty weak and not sturdy. It's not fallen apart yet...we've not put anything on it...but I don't expect it to last very long at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brooks Christol

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture. Very sturdy. If planning on buying cubes, wait until it’s assembled so you can measure. The holes are awkward sizes compared to other cube storage cases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best price--good quality
customer_reviews.text: This item was priced much higher at Wayfair and some other site I found so amazon beat the price. It was definitely easy to assemble but some of the wood dowels were a little narrower than the holes they fit into and it was difficult to keep them in place. wasn't too concerned about it because this can be fixed with wood glue if one has this issue. Overall, I am VERY pleased. Shipping was fast. Color is perfect. Size is just right.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA FIGUEROA-LUGARO

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional with lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product when I put it together. It is either very cheap wood or a particle board wood mix because it warps very easily it even a drop of water gets on it. It looks cheaper than the pictures on the sale pag,e but on the positive side it does not look bad, is very sturdy, functional and provides plenty of storage space. For the money it is still a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! So easy to put together for one person. It looks great with all my baskets. But I must warn that it scratches easily, especially if using a metal basket.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Smith

customer_reviews.title: 😍
customer_reviews.text: I love it i did it myself without my husband it took me 1hr 40min cuz at first i had no idea wat i was doing 🤣 then it got easy! I painted it and added Adhesive Marble contact paper from Walmart and made it into a coffee bar just need to paint my wall!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE it, exactly as promised and delivered in two day to Alaska. Which in 90% of cases, delivery TAKES FOREVER. Completely happy with product and was easy to assemble. LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: 2 Tan It All

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Easy assemble took about 1hr approximately. No scratches, dents or chips; which is always a plus. Currently using this as my beauty supply organizer. Gave it a 4 on sturdiness as one side seemed to be off. That may be because I had messed something up and had to take it apart. So the second time around it was worn? Maybe but when I put the second side up it was sturdy enough for me to be at ease. Does not look cheap. I think it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase this year!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this piece of furniture! Easy to assemble and looks great! Looks and feels sturdy. I get compliments all the time. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene F.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pregnant and I was able to put this together all alone! It’s adorable for the price and super sturdy.. I love it! I want to buy more of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Storage Unit
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this item. It really is beautiful. And the price was very reasonable for this quality! I have other products from this manufacturer and all are top quality!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Spurlin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this organizer. It fits in with my decor with its mission styling. Works well as a TV stand, I couldn't find one that I liked, but this works well. I like the cubes/shelves, they are nice and big. This works really well for me and what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: RIC

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble storage unit. I was able to put it together myself - read the directions fully and pay attention to the direction of the pieces. overall very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookcase
customer_reviews.text: My husband built this rather quick without much trouble, the only downside for us is it rocks some and we wish it was a bit more sturdy, even loaded up with books. But looks great and fits well in nursery, will just reinforce to the wall
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my office area
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. It was easy to put together. Got it for the office/workout area. Will add nice storage bins to hide some of my small workout accessories. I've been having to work from home due to the Coronavirus. This will allow me to do a couple of workouts in between calls and emails.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a darker grey. It also has "design marks" looks like scuff Marks. Directions could use work. The first step doesn't need to be until almost the very end. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to assemble. No dings or dents.
customer_reviews.text: This shelf nicely filled in a gap on my living room wall. It holds a lot of books and its low profile is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to separate my living space.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, it took my boyfriend about an hour and a half. I bought the gray and it matches perfect. I think it’s a little darker than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in great shape, easy to put together and looks great in my sewing room,
customer_reviews.author: vickie hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It is perfect for my bedroom as I did not want to buy a regular dresser. Sturdy and I can use a couple of the cubicles for Knick-knacks.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the cube organizer, it’s sturdy, I love the color, very good value for your bucks, doesn’t look cheap, satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely surprised
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice piece of furniture. It doesn’t seem like it would be but we live it. The design has really brought out house together. I love all the storage! You can adjust the shelving to a few different heights and you can store a lot on and in it! I would suggest you purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Brandy Wittwer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a good value. Easy to assemble by myself. Good quality for the price. Added cubby bins and have placed in our living room as discreet toy storage. Much better than a toy box.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Got two of them and put side by side under an 8-foot long bank of windows. Perfect height for the kitties to check out the outside world. Nice medium grey color
customer_reviews.author: Lyn G.

customer_reviews.title: missing back panel piece :(
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. However it is missing the back panel of the bottom middle shelf, I think that would help it be steadier and more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Husband wants real wood..
customer_reviews.text: My husband said I spent $125 on CRAP! Definitely NOT going in our living room...Doesn’t look or feel like real wood. I was aware of this;however, I thought it was still nice. I guess it’s going in the basement playroom...
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So much better looking than the ones at BBB or other ones I’ve seen in stores. So easy to assemble too. I bought it for a guest bedroom and it just looks better than all the cheaper ones I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cute cube organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can arrange the shelves how you want them and looks much more detailed than a standard cube organizer. I originally wanted a buffet, but this does the trick and was such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Came with damage to top piece, no box damage. Called # provided in instructions & they immediately sent new top within few days. Looks great. Used wood glue to strengthen during installation.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Uneven build and footing and shelving gaps.
customer_reviews.text: This is much darker (Black) than on picture. It’s uneven on the bottom and the shelves seem crooked (sideways) and there are gaps on the sides of the shelves. Mine came scratched on the surface (top).
customer_reviews.author: PolishPaul

customer_reviews.title: Great for organization
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect item for storage, I bought two because of the size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Preston

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: Was mostly easy to put together, looks great and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great price for solid piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sturdiness of this shelving unit. Classy looking piece of furniture that allows us plenty of space to display items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly... perfect for the space I needed it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! I love it. Im so proud of myself for putting it together. Instructions were pretty simple. You basically just figure it out as you go because it’s repetitive. Im so happy I bought this for our homeschooling supplies during these absurd times :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color easy to put together. It look better than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bush furniture is wonderful. It’s of good quality, elegant And classy. It may be hard for some people to build being the instructions are only pictures but it honestly wasn’t that bad. I enjoy building my furniture. I also bought another piece from them which I really love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Thank you it came fast and was easy to put together and it looks very nice all put together.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together with one person, sturdy, and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for scrapbooks and photo albums. Looks much more expensive than it is. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: McKenna Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my organizer!! It is a little smaller than I thought, but at the end it fits perfectly in the space I had! The color is nice, it looks really good!! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy piece of furniture Using as an entertainment stand... works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Grace Peters

customer_reviews.title: Ugh...
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong color and the unit was damaged. This is not made of wood like the description says. It’s press board.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Took less than an hour to put together, barely needed the instructions. Really great looking piece.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyAlice

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. We put this in an 11 year olds room for her tv and storage. Fits exactly as we needed.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Fully Adequate
customer_reviews.text: It didn't paint well, so love it as it is ... and I don't think it was meant for books. Just sayin'. In every other way, it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Just Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it’s not really antique white, it’s more of a beige. I also added floor pops to the top, and on some of the shelves to give it more of a pop for my coffee bar. It’s a nice size, and was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Dawne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: A great size! It stored most of what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Pearls

customer_reviews.title: it's amaizing!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in my life I made furniture! It was really easy. My daughter and I like it very much. Also, it is quickly delivered and perfectly Packed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: yoo!

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece, it was easy to assemble by myself and its sturdy. I use it for my record player
customer_reviews.author: JimNLeah

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the style. It is a good value and easy to assemble. The directions are easy to follow. It took me a couple of hours from start to finish because I did it alone. Perfect size for any TV under 50 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It came really fast omg they are amazing shipping love ordering from Amazon, great quality it's really stiff price it's good love it i definitely recommend im satisfy
customer_reviews.author: Jasiel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid construction and looks much nicer than the normal cube furniture - just make sure to check the square sizes before buying drawer pulls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected for an assembly required cabinet. I was able to put it together by myself in about 20 minutes. Perfect for our laundry room storage
customer_reviews.author: Briana Michel

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty for what it is. Kind of like ikea furniture. Once it’s together you leave it and don’t move it around much. Our kids are grown and so this won’t get much abuse. Should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mars Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This organizer went together beautifully all parts and hardware were easily assembled in less than an hour and looks really good. I would highly recommend this product. Just follow the directions exactly as shown in the paperwork.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Works well in my living room
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, good item for the cost. good shipping time, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality table!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves this accent table. It looks great in our dining room!
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Color is great. It’s truest, holds a 54” TV. I really like the cubby holes. Easy to assemble. I am not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t actually hold any weight; mine is bowing now. Also, the little legs underneath broke immediately.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Storage boxes 13x13 do not fit in cubby space . Have order new boxes
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but ok for a toy room.
customer_reviews.text: The shelf looks very nice, minus the damaged corner on the top. And, the cams kind of ruined the fake wood in places because it isn’t sturdy enough. The whole thing wobbles a bit. It would be stronger with a back on it.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy heavy bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bookcase. Nice sturdy wood and not too bad to assemble. Plenty of room in cubby’s.
customer_reviews.author: odalys

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with pieces broken
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery but two pieces (H) arrived broken. It can still be put together but now the front and the back show this noticeable crack down the middle. Shame because it is a nice cubed shelf and was simple to put together, just bad packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Trina P

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful piece! I put it together myself took about an hour. Very sturdy and the cubes are very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: gaby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality table and an excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality table and was very easy to assemble. It's very sturdy with high quality touches and I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MplsGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The color is more of a yellow than a true antique white
customer_reviews.author: Melina Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this furniture piece. I’m happy with it! Definitely recommend it if your looking for something like this!
customer_reviews.author: VondaCan

customer_reviews.title: wobbles
customer_reviews.text: looks great but kind of wobbly maybe that is the design fault though since it doesn't have a backing
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Loooks jut like the photo online. Seems sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Westover-Raach

product_meta.title: Bush Furniture Salinas 6 Cube Organizer in Antique White
product_meta.description: Color:Antique WhiteAn organized home has never felt so right. Choose the Bush Furniture salinas 6 cube organizer for serious storage space in a laid-back bookcase. Decorate a family home, cottage, apartment or dorm with a casual white bookcase featuring attractive wood accents, tapered legs and curved base rails. Six cubby shelves keep your home office under control or let you express yourself with space for your favorite photos or knickknacks. Two adjustable shelves help you make the bookcase your own. Finished in an on-trend, neutral antique white with a slightly distressed touch, the country charm of the 6 cube organizer will have you feeling relaxed wherever you call home. Backed by a Bush Furniture 1 year manufacturer's warranty, the bookcase meets ANSI/Soho standards for safety and quality. Complete your space with coordinating items from the salinas collection.
feature_bullets: 48W x 14D x 30H 6 Cube Organizer finished in Antique White with a slightly distressed touch for a casual look
6 cubby shelves designed for storage of home and office supplies or displaying decorative accents
1 fixed and 2 adjustable shelves offer flexibility
Tapered legs, curved base rails and decorative wood accents inspired by timeless Mission style
Three distressed finish options include Cape Cod Gray, Vintage Black or a cream colored Antique White

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars438 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
